channel.title: Basic on My digital home
channel.description: Recent content in Basic on My digital home

item.title: Introduction
item.description: Hello world Dear reader, I finally made it! Although I have basically no experience with web development, here is my personal website. I’m quite excited about this and it’s going to be interesting to see where it takes me. Of course I’d like to take all the credit but the truth is that there are software and services out there that make this kind of endeavour relatively easy and painless.
